alert.note: Alert for Kittitas Valley (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 09 at 10:45AM PST until December 10 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of one to three inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Kittitas Valley. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will start out as snow this afternoon before transitioning to mixed precipitation this evening and overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained for Oregon by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com, or for Washington by visiting online at https://wsdot.com/travel.
